member.name: F:Rhetos.Dom.DefaultConcepts.ApplyFilterWhere.Where
member.summary: (Optional) Selection of command where the filter will be applied. If not set (null), it is equivalent to "command => true".

member.name: T:Rhetos.Dom.DefaultConcepts.ApplyFiltersOnClientRead
member.summary: For a given data structure key, dictionary contains list of filters that will be automatically applied when executing ReadCommand.

members.member: Returned only if ReadCommandInfo.ReadTotalCount is set, otherwise it will be null.

member.name: P:Rhetos.Processing.DefaultCommands.ReadCommandResult.TotalCount
member.summary: The total number of records that would be returned without paging (ReadCommandInfo.Top or Skip). The value is returned only if ReadCommandInfo.ReadTotalCount is set.

member.name: T:Rhetos.Processing.DefaultCommands.ReadCommandInfo
member.summary: All members except DataSource are optional.

member.name: P:Rhetos.Processing.DefaultCommands.ReadCommandInfo.DataSource
member.summary: Name of the entity or other readable data structure.

member.name: P:Rhetos.Processing.DefaultCommands.ReadCommandInfo.ReadRecords
member.summary: If not set, the command will not return ReadCommandResult.Records.

member.name: P:Rhetos.Processing.DefaultCommands.ReadCommandInfo.ReadTotalCount
member.summary: If not set, the command will not return ReadCommandResult.TotalCount.

member.name: P:Rhetos.Processing.DefaultCommands.ReadCommandInfo.Top
member.summary: Limit the number of records in the result. Set to 0 (default) if not used.

member.name: P:Rhetos.Processing.DefaultCommands.ReadCommandInfo.Skip
member.summary: Skip the number of records in the result. Set to 0 (default) if not used.

member.name: P:Rhetos.Processing.DefaultCommands.DownloadReportCommandInfo.ConvertFormat
member.summary: Typically a file extension ("pdf", for example), or null if no conversion of report file type is needed.

member.name: P:Rhetos.Processing.DefaultCommands.QueryDataSourceCommandInfo.PageNumber
member.summary: Optional. Set to 0 if no paging is used.

member.name: P:Rhetos.Processing.DefaultCommands.QueryDataSourceCommandInfo.RecordsPerPage
member.summary: Optional. Set to 0 if no paging is used.
